desc: Welcome to Magick Shadows Crafting. We specialize in carrying spell kits, functional amulets, oils, chakra stones and crystals, and hand crafted runes. True Magick is believing in yourself!

layout.text: We specialize in carrying real magical items functional amulets, and spell kits. We also carry real crystals, candles, essential oils, Sage, runes and more. We reserve the right to only do business in the intercontinental United States.
